Summary: It looked like a shooting star, only after having lowered the share is also rising at a moderate speed.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was with a friend, we were going to the pool of the residence where we were staying when suddenly we saw this light in the sky about the size of a star, that after the descent is rising, all in about 10 seconds, after which it disappeared. While watching I was still, when she disappeared I was scared and I commented to my friend what had happened.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Messina
This sighting has never been favorited.
